languages.text: "Похоже, ткач его убил. Кто-то знает мертвеца? Он же еретиком был, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Похоже, ткач его убил. Кто-то знает мертвеца? Он же еретиком был, да?"

languages.text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"
languages.original_text: "Похоже, ткач его убил. Кто-то знает мертвеца? Он же еретиком был, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"
"I plead for your shepherds' mercy, O Undying One! For the blessing of liberty. The blessing of the afterlife!"
"Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

"Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

languages.text: «Parece que lo ha matado un tejedor. ¿Alguien conocía al difunto? Era un hereje, ¿no es cierto?».
languages.original_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

traits.locale_text: «Parece que lo ha matado un tejedor. ¿Alguien conocía al difunto? Era un hereje, ¿no es cierto?».

languages.text: 「どうやら織り手が殺したようです。誰か、この死んだ男を知っているか？こいつは異端者だった、そうだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

traits.locale_text: 「どうやら織り手が殺したようです。誰か、この死んだ男を知っているか？こいつは異端者だった、そうだろう？」

languages.text: “他应该是被织网者杀了。有谁认识这个死人吗？他是个异端分子，对吧？”
languages.original_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

traits.locale_text: “他应该是被织网者杀了。有谁认识这个死人吗？他是个异端分子，对吧？”

languages.text: "Sieht aus, als hätte ihn ein Spinner getötet. Kennt jemand den Toten? Er war ein Ketzer, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

traits.locale_text: "Sieht aus, als hätte ihn ein Spinner getötet. Kennt jemand den Toten? Er war ein Ketzer, oder?"

languages.text: « De toute évidence, un tisseur s'est chargé de lui régler son compte. Quelqu'un connaissait la victime ? Je me trompe ou c'était un hérétique ? »
languages.original_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, un tisseur s'est chargé de lui régler son compte. Quelqu'un connaissait la victime ? Je me trompe ou c'était un hérétique ? »

languages.text: "Görünüşe göre onu bir dokur öldürmüş. Ölü adamı tanıyan var mı? Kâfirin tekiydi, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Looks like a spinner killed him. Anybody know the dead man? He was a heretic, wasn't he?"
